dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome back, {{name}}! Here's your impact overview.
dashboard.error_fetch: Failed to fetch dashboard data. Please try again later.

charts.leaderboard_desc: Top clients by recycled volume in the period.
charts.composition_desc: Breakdown of waste types for your most active clients.
charts.pickup_trend_desc: Total weight collected month-over-month (by pickup date).
charts.emissions_desc: Environmental impact based on material type (kg CO2e).
charts.category_desc: High-level breakdown of all waste processed.
charts.facility_desc: Total volume processed at each facility (kg).

clients.title: Clients
clients.description: Manage your client profiles and their waste data.
clients.error_fetch: Failed to fetch clients. Please try again.
clients.table_no_clients: No clients found. Click "Add New Client" to get started.
clients.confirm_delete_title: Are you sure you want to delete this client?
clients.confirm_delete_desc: This action cannot be undone. All waste data and reports for this client will also be permanently deleted.

reports.title: Reports
reports.description: View and manage all your generated sustainability reports.
reports.error_fetch: Failed to fetch reports. Please try again.
reports.toast_fetch_error: Failed to fetch report data for download.
reports.table_no_reports: No reports have been generated yet.
